verses.verse: וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> set forward בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> [by] Jericho ס

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צִפּ֑וֹר <S%H6834><s%> of Zippor אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> all that Israel לָֽאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> to the Amorites

וַיָּ֨גָר <S%H1481><s%> afraid מוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> And Moab מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> of הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> was sore כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> because they [were] many ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיָּ֣קָץ <S%H6973><s%> was distressed מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> and Moab מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because of בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> And Moab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְלַחֲכ֤וּ <S%H3897><s%> lick up הַקָּהָל֙ <S%H6951><s%> Now shall this company אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סְבִ֣יבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5439><s%> all [that are] round about כִּלְחֹ֣ךְ <S%H3897><s%> licketh up הַשּׁ֔וֹר <S%H7794><s%> us as the ox אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יֶ֣רֶק <S%H3418><s%> the grass הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וּבָלָ֧ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צִפּ֛וֹר <S%H6834><s%> of Zippor מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [was] king לְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of the Moabites בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent מַלְאָכִ֜ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֣ם <S%H1109><s%> therefore unto Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּע֗וֹר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor פְּ֠תוֹרָה <S%H6604><s%> to Pethor אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is near הַנָּהָ֛ר <S%H5104><s%> which [is] by the river אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people לִקְרֹא־ <S%H7121><s%> to call ל֑וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> him saying הִ֠נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> Behold there is a people יָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> come out מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold כִסָּה֙ <S%H3680><s%> behold they cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> the face הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and they יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> and they abide מִמֻּלִֽי׃ <S%H4136><s%> over against

וְעַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> Now לְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> come נָּ֨א <S%H4994><s%> please אָֽרָה־ <S%H779><s%> now therefore I pray thee curse לִּ֜י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> me this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since עָצ֥וּם <S%H6099><s%> for they [are] too mighty הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> they מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> are too אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> perhaps אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> for me peradventure I shall prevail נַכֶּה־ <S%H5221><s%> [that] we may smite בּ֔וֹ וַאֲגָרְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <S%H1644><s%> them and [that] I may drive them out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> are too הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> for I wot אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom תְּבָרֵךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> that he whom thou blessest מְבֹרָ֔ךְ <S%H1288><s%> [is] blessed וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom תָּאֹ֖ר <S%H779><s%> and he whom thou cursest יוּאָֽר׃ <S%H779><s%> is cursed

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> departed זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> and the elders מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וּקְסָמִ֖ים <S%H7081><s%> with the rewards of divination בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> in their hand וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> unto him the words בָלָֽק׃ <S%H1111><s%> of Balak

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to לִ֤ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> unto them Lodge פֹה֙ <S%H6311><s%> here הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> here this night וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <S%H7725><s%> again אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> you word כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> shall speak יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> abode שָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> unto me and the princes מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בִּלְעָֽם׃ <S%H1109><s%> with Balaam

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֛י <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> What men הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> unto God בָּלָ֧ק <S%H1111><s%> Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צִפֹּ֛ר <S%H6834><s%> of Zippor מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> Behold [there is] a people הַיֹּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> come out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיְכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> which covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> the face הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now לְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> come קָֽבָה־ <S%H6895><s%> now curse לִּי֙ אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> perhaps אוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> me them peradventure I shall be able לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> to overcome בּ֖וֹ וְגֵרַשְׁתִּֽיו׃ <S%H1644><s%> them and drive them out

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go עִמָּהֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָאֹר֙ <S%H779><s%> with them thou shalt not curse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בָר֖וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> for they [are] blessed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> unto the princes בָלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> of Balak לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> to go אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַרְצְכֶ֑ם <S%H776><s%> you into your land כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵאֵ֣ן <S%H3985><s%> refuseth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לְתִתִּ֖י <S%H5414><s%> to give me leave לַהֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> back עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיָּק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> rose up שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> And the princes מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said מֵאֵ֥ן <S%H3985><s%> refuseth בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam הֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> to come עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> yet

וַיֹּ֥סֶף <S%H3254><s%> yet again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Then בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak שְׁלֹ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> sent שָׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> princes רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> more וְנִכְבָּדִ֖ים <S%H3513><s%> and more honourable מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> the former

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> to Balaam וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> to him Thus saith בָּלָ֣ק <S%H1111><s%> Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צִפּ֔וֹר <S%H6834><s%> of Zippor אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nothing נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> beg תִמָּנַ֖ע <S%H4513><s%> Let nothing I pray thee hinder מֵהֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> thee from coming אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כַבֵּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> great אֲכַבֶּדְךָ֙ <S%H3513><s%> honour מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> thee unto very וְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> whatsoever thou sayest אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> and אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> and I will do וּלְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> come נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please קָֽבָה־ <S%H6895><s%> therefore I pray thee curse לִּ֔י אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> me this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered בִּלְעָ֗ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> unto the servants בָלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> of Balak אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> would give לִ֥י בָלָ֛ק <S%H1111><s%> If Balak מְלֹ֥א <S%H4393><s%> full בֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> me his house כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> I cannot לַעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> go beyond אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> the word יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <S%H430><s%> my God לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do קְטַנָּ֖ה <S%H6996><s%> less א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> or more

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁב֨וּ <S%H3427><s%> Now therefore I pray you tarry נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please בָזֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> here גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> ye also here this night וְאֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <S%H3045><s%> that I may know מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יֹּסֵ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> unto me more יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> what the LORD דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> will say עִמִּֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָם֮ <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam לַיְלָה֒ <S%H3915><s%> at night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לִקְרֹ֤א <S%H7121><s%> to call לְךָ֙ בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> come הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men ק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> thee rise up לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> up go אִתָּ֑ם <S%H854><s%> but וְאַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> with them but yet אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> which I shall say אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> תַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto thee that shalt thou do

וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַֽיַּחֲבֹ֖שׁ <S%H2280><s%> and saddled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲתֹנ֑וֹ <S%H860><s%> his ass וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> with the princes מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> stood מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> But the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּמִשְׁע֖וֹל <S%H4934><s%> in a path הַכְּרָמִ֑ים <S%H3754><s%> of the vineyards גָּדֵ֥ר <S%H1447><s%> a wall מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְגָדֵ֥ר <S%H1447><s%> [being] on this side and a wall מִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> side

וַיּ֥וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> further מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֲב֑וֹר <S%H5674><s%> went וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and stood בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place צָ֔ר <S%H6862><s%> in a narrow אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> where אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> where [was] no way לִנְט֖וֹת <S%H5186><s%> to turn יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> either to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> or to the left

וַתִּרְאַ֙נִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw הָֽאָת֔וֹן <S%H860><s%> And the ass וַתֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> me and turned לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> from me זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> these three רְגָלִ֑ים <S%H7272><s%> times אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> unless נָטְתָ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> she had turned מִפָּנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> from me כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> surely עַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אֹתְכָ֥ה <S%H853><s%> הָרַ֖גְתִּי <S%H2026><s%> surely now also I had slain וְאוֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> הֶחֱיֵֽיתִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> thee and saved her alive

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָ֜ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> unto the angel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חָטָ֔אתִי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> for I knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> not that thou stoodest לִקְרָאתִ֖י <S%H7125><s%> against בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if רַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> affliction אָשׁ֥וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> I will get me back again לִּֽי׃

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֗ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men וְאֶ֗פֶס <S%H657><s%> but only אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that I shall speak אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> תְדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> unto thee that thou shalt speak וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> So Balaam עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> with the princes בָלָֽק׃ <S%H1111><s%> of Balak

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heard בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> And when Balak כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֣א <S%H935><s%> was come בִלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> that Balaam וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> he went out לִקְרָאת֜וֹ <S%H7125><s%> to meet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> him unto a city מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> which [is] in the border אַרְנֹ֔ן <S%H769><s%> of Arnon אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> which [is] in the utmost הַגְּבֽוּל׃ <S%H1366><s%> coast

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בָּלָ֜ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֗ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam הֲלֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁלֹ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> Did I not earnestly שָׁלַ֤חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> send אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you לִקְרֹא־ <S%H7121><s%> unto thee to call לָ֔ךְ לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָלַ֖כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> thee? wherefore camest אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me הַֽאֻמְנָ֔ם <S%H552><s%> indeed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> thou not unto me? am I not able כַּבְּדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3513><s%> to promote thee to honour

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָ֜ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֗ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak הִֽנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> Lo I am come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now הֲיָכ֥וֹל <S%H3605><s%> am I אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> unto thee have I now any power דַּבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> to say מְא֑וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> anything הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָשִׂ֧ים <S%H7760><s%> putteth אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> that God בְּפִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> in my mouth אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> that shall I speak

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> with Balak וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came קִרְיַ֥ת חֻצֽוֹת׃ <S%H7155><s%> to Kiriath-huzoth

וַיִּזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> offered בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak בָּקָ֣ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen וָצֹ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> and sheep וַיְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent לְבִלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> to Balaam וְלַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> and to the princes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> that Balak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam וַֽיַּעֲלֵ֖הוּ <S%H5927><s%> and brought him up בָּמ֣וֹת בָּ֑עַל <S%H1120><s%> of Baal וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> that thence he might see מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> the utmost הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> [part] of the people
